name: The Best Stealth Game of All Time
name_original: The Best Stealth Game of All Time
description:
The Best Stealth Game of All Time

Created by: Aleksander Cylwik, Bryan Soto, and Andrew Ward

Play as an ex-military operative who picks up contracts from the highest bidder. These contracts must be performed perfectly and result in no casualties. No weapons are allowed and being detected results in immediate death. And most importantly stay out of the light!
